column4: are there alternate installation cd's available for servers ?
I think all server images are alternate
the thing is I need to be able to launch a commandline so that I can launch a preseed file and this is not possible with the usual setup cd's

well, it might be available somewhere in the installer, or maybe recovery mode... I don't remember, sorry. LiveCDs have it as boot parameter, but this is not the case. They also fall back to busybox, but I have no idea if alternate images do that.
